data.title: Indiana Farm Offers Baby Cow Cuddle Sessions and It’s So Cute I Can’t Stand It
data.meta_description: One Indiana farm specializes in the world's most adorable animals and I couldn't agree more!
data.text:
One Indiana farm specializes in the "world's most adorable animals" and I couldn't agree more!

3 Heifers Farm

A hobby farm specializing in the most adorable animals is located in Fairmount, Indiana.

We are a small hobby farm, inviting you to join us along the way! We will host small events, parties, field trips and pictures; join us as we go!! Be sure to come check out some of the Worlds Cutest Animals!

People flock from all over to visit 3 Heifers Farm, and photographers often visit to take photos of the adorable animals. I mean have you ever seen a photo of a Highland Cow and didn't say "awww?" They are adorable! And now 3 Heifers Farm is hosting baby cow cuddle sessions, and I may just cry, the photos from these sessions are so cute.

Cow Cuddle Sessions

3 Heifers Farm wants to share these adorable animals with as many people as they can, so they offer Cow Cuddle Sessions, and for $15 you can get 30- minutes of cuddle and playtime with an adorable baby cow.

According to their post on Facebook, you get a private meet and greet session, you can cuddle the baby cow, bottle feed, brush, and pet the sweet animal.

These cuddle sessions fill up quickly and according to a post on the 3 Heifers Farm Facebook page, the October cuddle sessions will go live this Friday (August 3rd).
